sentences.en: ‘Can I come along?’ ‘Certainly.’
sentences.cn: “我可以一起去吗？”“当然可以。”

sentences.en: ‘I’d like a beer, please.’ ‘Certainly, sir.’
sentences.cn: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.en: ‘Not smoking has made a real difference.’ ‘It most certainly has.’
sentences.cn: “不抽烟确实大不相同。”“这当然了。”

sentences.en: "Perhaps it would be better if I withdrew altogether." — "Certainly not!"
sentences.cn: “也许，我完全退出更好吧。”——“当然不是！”

sentences.en: "You keep out of their way don't you?" — "I certainly do."
sentences.cn: “你会离他们远远的，是吧？”——“一点儿不假。”

sentences.en: He certainly wasn't going to bid $18 billion for this company.
sentences.cn: 他肯定不会出180亿美元来收购这家公司。

sentences.en: Herr Schmidt is certainly the most odious man I have ever met.
sentences.cn: 赫尔·施密特无疑是我见过的最让人作呕的人。

sentences.en: I certainly never expected to become a writer.
sentences.cn: 我当然从未期望自己成为一名作家。

sentences.en: I certainly think there should be a ban on tobacco advertising.
sentences.cn: 我确实认为应该禁止香烟广告.

sentences.en: It is a complex system, but it certainly makes a change.
sentences.cn: 这是个复杂的体系，不过确实有所改变。

sentences.en: It was certainly serious enough for him to reconvene Parliament.
sentences.cn: 他重新召集国会当然是件非常重大的事了。

sentences.en: It would almost certainly mean the end of NATO.
sentences.cn: 这几乎肯定会导致北大西洋公约组织的终结。

sentences.en: She was certainly not the type to murder her husband.
sentences.cn: 她绝不是那种会谋杀亲夫的人。

sentences.en: The arrested man will almost certainly be kept at this police station.
sentences.cn: 几乎可以肯定，被逮捕的男子将被扣押在该警察局。

sentences.en: The girl was almost certainly murdered.
sentences.cn: 几乎可以肯定，这个女孩是被人谋杀的。

sentences.en: They were rarely seen together and certainly did not travel together.
sentences.cn: 很少见到他们在一起，当然更不可能一起旅行。

sentences.en: They’re certainly not mine.
sentences.cn: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.en: This was almost certainly the high-water mark of her career.
sentences.cn: 这几乎肯定是她事业的巅峰。

sentences.en: Total devotion it certainly was, slavish devotion some would say.
sentences.cn: 这当然是绝对的忠诚，有人也许会称之为俯首帖耳，唯命是从。

sentences.en: We are certainly seeing a lot of hype by some companies.
sentences.cn: 我们无疑已经看到来自一些公司的大肆宣传。

sentences.en: You look great, Brian. The Bahamas certainly agree with you.
sentences.cn: 你看上去气色好极了，布赖恩。巴哈马显然很适合你。

words.tran_cn: 某一；必然的；确信；无疑的；有把握的

trans.tran_en: used to agree or give your permission
